summary: The implementation covers most core requirements including artist profiles, job marketplace, gigs marketplace, bookings system, and product store with Stripe integration. However, several key acceptance criteria are missing or only partially implemented: no evidence of artist profile editing, no availability calendar for bookings, incomplete shopping cart functionality (can add but cannot complete purchases for products separate from Stripe checkout), and no booking notifications system. The visual design with warm earth tones is implemented via Tailwind CSS configuration. Generated image assets are referenced but their actual generation/presence is not confirmed in the diff.

missing_requirements.reason: No backend mutation or frontend UI found for editing existing artist profiles. Only createArtistProfile exists.

missing_requirements.requirement: Artists can set their availability in a calendar interface
missing_requirements.reason: No availability calendar implementation found. Booking system exists but no artist availability management.
No notification system implementation found in backend or frontend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Customers can complete product purchases through shopping cart
missing_requirements.reason: Cart functionality exists (add/remove items) but product checkout appears to redirect to generic Stripe checkout. No product-specific purchase flow completion evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Services system with CRUD operations (createService, updateService, deleteService, getServicesByArtist)
hallucinated_features.reason: Services are not mentioned in BuildRequest. Only gigs (artist-offered services) and bookings are specified. The backend implements a separate Service type and management system not requested.
UserProfileSetup component exists but is commented out/disabled. No user profile system was requested beyond artist profiles.
